  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Iterable<DisplayMode.Value>, Collection<DisplayMode.Value>, List<DisplayMode.Value>, RandomAccess
    public class DisplayMode
extends Stack<DisplayMode.Value>
    the display mode stack is mainly controlled by the various JSP tags with a 'mode' attribute set
    See Also:
